trans-unit.source: Defines a base class for all deployment-related exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 定義所有與部署相關之例外狀況的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException> is the base class of all deployment-related exceptions thrown by the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException> 基底類別的所有部署相關例外狀況擲回的<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Represents text as a series of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 將文字表示為一系列的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Stores all the data needed to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 儲存序列化或還原序列化物件所需的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: Describes the source and destination of a given serialized stream, and provides an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: 描述給定序列化資料流的來源和目的端，並且提供其他呼叫端定義的內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Represents text as a series of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 將文字表示為一系列的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Represents errors that occur during application execution.
trans-unit.target: 代表應用程式執行期間所發生的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用例外狀況的相關資訊來設定 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。
